getAutofillInitData.description: This is called inside an overlay (eg: on Windows or soon also on macOS) to retrieve available data

getAutofillCredentials.description: Used to retrieve a specific set of credentials

setSize.description: Used by Windows to communicate the desired size of the overlay to the native side

selectedDetail.description: Used by Windows to communicate a selected autofill item to the native side

closeAutofillParent.description: Used by Windows to instruct native sides to close any autofill overlays
